author: @sonalisamal2009
text: Hot is one of the songs that got me interested in Seventeen, which led me to check out more songs, before I finally became a Carat. I love this cowboy version. I like the little changes they made in choreography here. Jeonghan had my attention the most when I'd first seen the original MV, and he continued to do so, no matter how many times I watched. But then I also noticed all the members who were fantastic. I thought of saying how The8 looked so cool, but the next moment I was in awe of Hoshi's energy, then I was like Vernon is so good, Dino is great, Joshua is amazing and I kept saying that for every member. And, now I can't say who stood out the most for me. It's so difficult to focus on one, when all of them are so perfect ❤

author: @choose2bekindd
text:
“The Lord is not slow in keeping his promise, as some understand slowness. Instead he is patient with you, not wanting anyone to perish, but everyone to come to repentance.”
‭‭2 Peter‬ ‭3:9‬ ‭NIV‬

ROMANS 10:9-11 “If you declare with your mouth, “Jesus is Lord,” and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved. For it is with your heart that you believe and are justified, and it is with your mouth that you profess your faith and are saved. As Scripture says, “Anyone who believes in him will never be put to shame” 

Matthew 11:28-30  “Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you and learn from me, for I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls. For my yoke is easy and my burden is light.”

“For the Son of Man came to seek and to save the lost.””
‭‭Luke‬ ‭19:10‬ ‭

God wants us to believe in His One and Only Son, Jesus Christ our Lord and Savior, who died for our sins :D When we truly believe in our hearts that Jesus is the Son of God, who died for our sins so we could have eternal life with God, we are saved from the eternal fire and have eternal life in Christ Jesus!! 💖 May God bless you all!! 🤗💗

author: @ayuannur9557
text:
I'm worried about Jun and Woozi's shadow dance. Jun needs to lay down... and it was on top of the sand. He slays it though. Am I worried for nothing?
And I carefully observe the members. They look very cool, yes, but I'm worried doing such hard dynamic choreos on top of the sand might make them slippery and resulted having injuries. Though they did the choreography under the rain and splash water for Ready to Love, but as long as the shoes were antislip, they would be fine. Is it the same though for dancing on top of the sand? Hopefully the crew and staff can prepare another legend stage again but with much more safety environment for their backdrop. 

Therefore, I really respect how professional and amazing artist every Seventeen's members are. You guys slay!
